trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="5f899b93-bb69-491d-a33b-509956a1fd1a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight MapReduce Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="5f899b93-bb69-491d-a33b-509956a1fd1a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight MapReduce Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: This topic provides information about using the MapReduce Transformation with the HDInsight Activity.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides information about using the MapReduce Transformation with the HDInsight Activity.

trans-unit.source: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>MapReduce</embeddedLabel> transformation with the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.
trans-unit.target: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>MapReduce</embeddedLabel> transformation with the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the class for <embeddedLabel>className</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the class for <embeddedLabel>className</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for <embeddedLabel>jarFilePath</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the path to the JAR file including the file name for <embeddedLabel>jarFilePath</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for <embeddedLabel>jarLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property.
trans-unit.target: Specify the linked service that refers to the Azure Blob Storage that contains the JAR file for <embeddedLabel>jarLinkedService</embeddedLabel> property.

trans-unit.source: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> section.
trans-unit.target: Specify any arguments for the MapReduce program in the <embeddedLabel>arguments</embeddedLabel> section.

trans-unit.source: Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory
